'''Dimesa''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A strapping godlike blinks between the swollen, crusty tumors lining her eyes. Her lips crack, weeping a sappy substance as she speaks. Dimesa sells both original goods - and those of questionable quality.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =Weapons, armor, accessories, ingredients. Unique items include [Sun and Moon](/sunAndMoon/), [Squid's Grasp](/squidsGrasp/), [Rekvu's Stained Grasps](/rekvusStainedGrasps/), [Mirrorback](/mirrorback/), [Voidward](/voidward/), [Iridescent Scale](/iridescentScale/), and various generic accessories.
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
}}
